name: search_online
content:
import os
import requests
from datetime import datetime
import pytz


class Tools:
    def __init__(self):
        self.citation = True

    def search_online(self, query: str) -> str:
        """
        Search for online information using users' query using Google.
        This can be useful when the database does not contain any information about this product or
        user ask question about:
            Support - service:
                Policy and purchase instructions reply
                Purchasing instructions and policy conversion
                Order lookup
                Policy and warranty updates
                Service maintenance extensions
                Policy security
                Thinking resolution policy
                Operating regulations
            Contact information.
        Use this tools to search for the requirement and return results including URL and information.
        """
        return requests.get(
            f"http://fastapi:8000/search_online/?product_name={query}"
        ).text

specs.name: search_online
specs.description: Search for online information using users' query using Google.

meta.description: Search for a product by its name using Google when the database does not contain any information about this product.
